item.title: Instant
item.description: INTRODUCTION Instant was released for week 11 of HTB’s Season 6, Heist. It’s about a company that provides a money transfer service - both an app and an accompanying API. While it’s marked as “Medium” box, I would personally rate this one more as an “Easy”. The most difficult aspect is having knowledge of the correct tools to use (and a bit of determination during enumeration). The website urges us to download an app, in the form of an Android APK.
